cough up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to give someone money, information etc when you do not really want to
cough up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Insurance companies had to cough up £10 million in storm damage claims.
cough up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to push something out of your throat or lungs into your mouth
cough up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: You must go to the doctor if you’re coughing up blood.
cough up.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Grumman finally coughed up $40 million in settlement of the legal claims against it.
We’ll get a new TV as soon as the insurance company coughs up.
